data.name: Saleblazers Demo
data.detailed_description:
Build a fully simulated shop with up to 8 friends and survive a perilous island environment.

Thank you for checking out our game!

In this demo build, you'll be able to explore the basics of our shopkeeping and combat systems. Gameplay and performance are not final. The full version of the game will feature a co-op narrative campaign, PvP server hopping, mastery unlocks, more items, and advanced shopkeeping mechanics.

We hope you'll enjoy this experience we've prepared for you.

data.short_description: Build a shop and survive a perilous open world with up to 8 friends in the ultimate multiplayer shopkeeping survival experience.
